taskconfiguration.conf_text: Config { name = "Turing-Maschine (als Computer)" , conditions = [ ] , arity = 1 , op = x1 * x1 , num_args = 20 , max_arg = 10 , cut = 15000 , checks = [ Sane ] , start = Turing { eingabealphabet = mkSet ".1" , arbeitsalphabet = mkSet "#.01" , leerzeichen = '#' , zustandsmenge = mkSet [ 0 , 1 , 2 , 3 , 4 , 7 ] , tafel = collect [ ( '0' , 0 , '1' , 1 , L ) , ( '0' , 1 , '1' , 2 , L ) , ( '0' , 2 , '1' , 3 , L ) , ( '0' , 3 , '1' , 0 , R ) , ( '0' , 4 , '1' , 7 , L ) , ( '1' , 0 , '1' , 2 , R ) , ( '1' , 1 , '1' , 1 , L ) , ( '1' , 2 , '0' , 4 , R ) , ( '1' , 3 , '1' , 3 , R ) , ( '1' , 4 , '0' , 0 , R ) ] , startzustand = 0 , endzustandsmenge = mkSet [ 7 ] } }
taskconfiguration.description: Konstruieren Sie eine Turingmaschine für f(x) = x².
